name: Shadow Defense: Kingdom
description:
The strategy game for smart people
The best Tower Defense game – The best Kingdom of Heaven

FEATURES:
• 42 amazing towers
• 10 most powerful weapons: rocket, plasma, cannon, laser, thunder…
• 10 dangerous enemies
• 27 challenge maps
• Fantastic graphics quality
• Addictive gameplay
• New 3D game technology on mobile

If you are a big fan of Tower Defense series. If you want to play a 3D PC game on mobile. If you are a strategy guy. Yes, this is the best game for you.
